projectsInfo.name: Inventmart
projectsInfo.description: Inventmart is a warehouse project as part of college work practice in my college built using Java Spring framework, Jfoenix, and Jasper Report connected to MySQLite Database.

projectsInfo.name: Speed Laundry
projectsInfo.description: Speed Laundry is a laundry app for Speed Laundry in bekasi, it built using android studio with java, and backend using Laravel 8 with sanctum auth.This app is created for the purpose to  make laundry much more easier, it has a lot of feature, including e-wallet based payment, status notification for the laundry transaction, and generate report for owner needs.

projectsInfo.name: Rumassa
projectsInfo.description: Rumassa is a social app that helps to connect with a former friends in Kuningan SMA 1 Highscool created with Android Studio Java, it has many feature including sharepost and timeline, news, marketplace and donation.

projectsInfo.name: Movie App
projectsInfo.description: movie app it's just my personal project for nuxt and axios learning to get newest movie release from Movie DB API.

projectsInfo.name: Shekembar Wedding Organizer
